full_title: imperfect for you by Ariana Grande
title: imperfect for you

description.plain:
The penultimate track in Ariana Grande’s “eternal sunshine”, “imperfect for you”, emphasizes the beauty of imperfection within a relationship.

Additionally, ‘imperfect for you" is built on the wordplay “I’m perfect for you”, eliciting the idea that through one’s imperfections, there is perfection and idealism.

In an interview with Zane Lowe on Apple Music, Grande shared insights into why the song is one of her top 3 favorites on the album. She revealed that the song is about the unconditional acceptance from family and friends, who make space for our imperfections with their own. Grande emphasized that the song demands room for nuance, humanness, and complexity, that “we’re so used to being stripped of these days”.

embed_content: Read “imperfect for you” by Ariana Grande on Genius
recording_location: Jungle Studios (New York, NY), MXM Studios (Stockholm, SE) and Decoy Studios (Suffolk, UK)

album.full_title: eternal sunshine deluxe: brighter days ahead (instrumental version) by Ariana Grande
album.name: eternal sunshine deluxe: brighter days ahead (instrumental version)

Grande emphasized that the song demands room for nuance, humanness, and complexity, that “we’re so used to being stripped of these days”.
